artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Aritaya Seiemon
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 14 3/8 × 9 5/8 in. (36.5 × 24.5 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban) each sheet
markings: left sheet: red artist\'s toshidama seal; each sheet, censor seals:  濱 {Hama} | 馬込{Magome} | publisher\'s seal: {Chō} | 長　芝神有田屋 {Shiba Shin Aritaya}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: on each sheet: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Hiragana seisuiki ひらかな盛衰記, performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1849, 5th month.
title: Actors Nakamura Utaemon IV as the boatman Matsuemon (R) and Bandō Shuka I as his wife Oyoshi (L)
